about_the_game:
Mask - Beyond lies is an Otome Game set in a fantasy world full of Yokai. As you are transported in in another world, a masked person guides you through the day to the exit to go back to your world. But will it really be this easy ?

Go through the story of each love interest and discover their secrets, and so much more. Each choices might make you discover the darkest secret of their world. Are you ready to do everything to go back to your own world ? Will you ever go back ?

Features :

  • French and English languages (for now !),
  • Four (handsome) love interests with their own routes,
  • A lot of choice that impact the game,
  • A cast of fun and interesting characters,
  • A lot of CGs ,
  • A main character with personality.

content_descriptors.notes: All "mature scene" will be optional and can be skipped.
